item.title: Adapting to a Hybrid Workforce with 1E's Tachyon 8 Product
item.description: Adapting to a Hybrid Workforce with 1E’s Tachyon Product Beginning in early 2021, there has been a trending increase in the number of people that are quitting their jobs due to what seems to be a direct result of the COVID-19 pandemic. This trend, primarily in the United States, has been termed the Great Resignation, with four million Americans resigning in April alone. For some, illness directly related to COVID-19 may be why weâ€™re seeing this shift to resigning, and for others, it may be the desire to find a new job that fits the new lifestyle that they have been forced to adopt.
